org.optaplanner.core.impl.domain.variable.listener

Interface StatefulVariableListener<Entity_>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Supply, VariableListener<Entity_>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalizedAnchorVariableSupply, ExternalizedCollectionInverseVariableSupply, ExternalizedSingletonInverseVariableSupply

    public interface StatefulVariableListener<Entity_>
extends VariableListener<Entity_>
    A stateful VariableListener, often used to externalize data for a Supply from the domain model itself.
